name: Terminal Monsters
description: A terminal application built with Ruby where monsters participate in turn based battle.

name: YourNextCharacter
description: A web application built with Ruby on Rails using PostgreSQL which allows users to upload and download character sheet files for role playing games.

name: Colours of Kanye
description: Hackathon project in which I collaborated with other developers to build a tool that help generate random colors and also witness the magnificent mind of Kanye.

name: ally
description: A team project for the Entain 2022 Connectathon that focused on raising awareness for gender diverse struggles in the tech industry.
